sentence.text: Malonyl coenzyme A (CoA) decarboxylase (EC 4.1.1.9, acetyl-CoA biosynthetic process) deficiency, or malonic aciduria, is a rare inborn error of metabolism characterised by a variable phenotype of developmental delay, seizures, cardiomyopathy and acidosis.
This case of malonic aciduria with cardiomyopathy demonstrates improvement in cardiac function attributable to polysaccharide digestion-restricted/MCT-supplemented diet
